list_definition.definition: beyond what is right and proper

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The manager expects them to do an excessive amount of work.

list_ex_of_english: The use of colorful language and superfluous details is further illustrated by the journalist's excessive description of the protagonist's appearance.
